1583940.name: Diodius ~PREMONITION~: Roots of Naka
1583940.description:
Another great mission awaits!


The Doge has fallen, but evil never sleeps. It looks like Naka has some new enemies, bearing the power of Mech Stones.
They are hiding in uncharted lands of Naka. Find the enemy, kill them, and save the kingdom of Bromberg once again!

This new DLC comes a new area with 15 new levels, featuring 4 new quests, 5 new bosses,
a new Boss Rush mode and some more achievements to unlock!
1583940.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 波兰语
